meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Meredith Lowmaster Jan Walkenhorst Stephanie Jass Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6458.

td.p: Meredith Lowmaster, a medical research technician from Quincy, Massachusetts
Jan Walkenhorst, a university athletic department tutor from Lincoln, Nebraska
Stephanie Jass, a history professor from Milan, Michigan (whose 7-day cash winnings total $147,570)

tr.td: (Alex: For 25 years, we have been looking for him...)
QUOTABLE NOTABLES
THE BEATLES: THE EARLY YEARS
MAKE ME A DRINK, BARKEEP!
LIVING IN TENTS
"OCC"-UPY JEOPARDY!
